p.k: In Animal Doctors, two vets are out to save Australia’s wildlife by setting up an operating theatre in the bush, while in the UK some abused chimpanzees are rescued by Animal Helpers from a life of slavery. This week’s How To travels to the London Aquarium to look at the delicate art of caring for fish, and Animal World opens the doors to one of London’s greatest animal allies - the Blue Cross Animal Hospital, a charity that is provides free treatment for the pets of those who can’t afford vets’ fees.
